You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &euml

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Euml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cb/index.htm U+000CB].
  * `&Euml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cb/index.htm U+000CB].
  * `&euml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00eb/index.htm U+000EB].
  * `&euml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00eb/index.htm U+000EB].
